TopicTitle: How to stop youtube audio from "chopping"?

Articles.Content: Well for like a month my youtube audio has been starting and stopping randomly. I\'ve cleared my chrome cache on the setting 'Since the beginning of time'. That doesn\'t help. Is it possible to get rid of this? Also, in case you need my OS it\'s windows vista business edition or whatever.
Found a way to stop this my self. I found a flash player settings program, looks like it has a seperate local storage system. Press the delete all and it removes 99% of the chopping.
